it.cnr.isti.wnlab.indoornavigation.utils.localization.kalmanfilter

Class KalmanFilterStrategy

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.cnr.isti.wnlab.indoornavigation.observer.AbstractEmitter<IndoorPosition>
      • it.cnr.isti.wnlab.indoornavigation.AbstractIndoorLocalizationStrategy
        • it.cnr.isti.wnlab.indoornavigation.utils.localization.kalmanfilter.KalmanFilterStrategy
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IndoorLocalizationStrategy, Emitter<IndoorPosition>, Observer<PDR.Result>

    public class KalmanFilterStrategy
extends AbstractIndoorLocalizationStrategy
implements Observer<PDR.Result>
    A simple localization strategy that: - The main position is defined by PDR - PDR is refined with error correction using Magnetic Mismatch - Magnetic Mismatch positions are inscribed in a circular fence having the Wifi fingerprint-found position as its center.
